instructions.name: update_floor
docs: Permissionless floor update crank (computes floor from reserves & supply)

accounts.name: buffer
docs: Buffer must be associated with this market

accounts.name: vault_0
docs: Vault 0 - must be the correct PDA for this market

accounts.name: vault_1
docs: Vault 1 - must be the correct PDA for this market

accounts.name: project_mint
docs: Project mint must be the non-FeelsSOL token in this market

accounts.name: escrow_token_account
docs: Optional: Pre-launch escrow token account (if tokens still in escrow)

accounts.name: clock
docs: Optional: Other protocol-owned token accounts to exclude
These would be accounts holding tokens that should not be considered circulating
Note: This is handled as remaining_accounts in the instruction handler

instructions.name: set_protocol_owned_override
docs: Set protocol owned override for floor calculation (governance only)

accounts.name: buffer
docs: Note: We don't check buffer.authority here because it's set to the market creator,
not the protocol authority. The protocol authority can still manage overrides

accounts.name: authority
docs: Protocol authority - only they can set overrides

instructions.name: register_pool
docs: Register a pool in the registry

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority (must be registry authority or market authority)

docs: Initialize a POMM (Protocol-Owned Market Making) position

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority that can initialize POMM positions

accounts.name: buffer
docs: Buffer that will own this POMM position

accounts.name: pomm_position
docs: Uses a PDA derived from market and position index

accounts.name: pomm_position
docs: POMM position account - must be initialized separately
Uses a PDA derived from market and position index

instructions.name: initialize_market
docs: Initialize a new market with commitment for initial liquidity
Market creation and liquidity commitment are atomic, preventing
front-running. Actual liquidity deployment happens separately via

accounts.name: protocol_token_0
docs: Protocol token registry for token_0 (if not FeelsSOL)

accounts.name: protocol_token_1
docs: Protocol token registry for token_1 (if not FeelsSOL)

accounts.name: escrow
docs: Pre-launch escrow for the protocol token

accounts.name: creator_feelssol
docs: Creator's FeelsSOL account for initial buy

accounts.name: creator_token_out
docs: Creator's token account for receiving initial buy tokens

instructions.name: enter_feelssol
docs: Enter FeelsSOL - deposit JitoSOL to mint FeelsSOL

accounts.name: user
docs: SECURITY: Must be a system account to prevent PDA identity confusion

accounts.name: jitosol_vault
docs: JitoSOL vault (pool-owned by the FeelsSOL hub pool)

instructions.name: exit_feelssol
docs: Exit FeelsSOL - burn FeelsSOL to redeem JitoSOL

accounts.name: user
docs: SECURITY: Must be a system account to prevent PDA identity confusion

accounts.name: jitosol_vault
docs: JitoSOL vault (pool-owned by the FeelsSOL hub pool)

accounts.name: user
docs: The user initiating the swap transaction
Must be a system account (not a PDA) to prevent identity confusion attacks

accounts.name: market
docs: The market account containing trading pair state
Must be initialized, not paused, and not currently in a reentrant call

accounts.name: market_authority
docs: Market authority PDA that controls vault operations
Used as signer for transferring tokens from vaults to users

accounts.name: buffer
docs: Buffer account for fee collection and protocol-owned market making

accounts.name: oracle
docs: Oracle account for tracking time-weighted average prices (TWAP)

accounts.name: user_token_in
docs: User's token account for the input token being swapped
Ownership and mint validation performed in handler

accounts.name: user_token_out
docs: User's token account for the output token being received
Ownership and mint validation performed in handler

accounts.name: token_program
docs: SPL Token program for executing transfers

accounts.name: clock
docs: Clock sysvar for timestamp and epoch tracking

accounts.name: protocol_config
docs: Protocol configuration account for fee rates

accounts.name: protocol_treasury
docs: Protocol treasury token account (mandatory for protocol fees)

accounts.name: protocol_token
docs: Protocol token registry entry (optional - only for protocol-minted tokens)

accounts.name: creator_token_account
docs: Creator token account (optional - only if creator fees > 0 and protocol token present)

accounts.name: provider
docs: SECURITY: Must be a system account to prevent PDA identity confusion

accounts.name: position_mint
docs: Position mint - a simple SPL token representing ownership

accounts.name: position_token_account
docs: Position token account - where the position token is minted

accounts.name: position
docs: Position account (PDA) - stores all position state

accounts.name: lower_tick_array
docs: Tick array containing the lower tick

accounts.name: upper_tick_array
docs: Tick array containing the upper tick

docs: SECURITY: Must be a system account to prevent PDA identity confusion

accounts.name: position_token_account
docs: Position token account (must hold exactly 1 token)

accounts.name: position
docs: SECURITY: Account closure handled in instruction logic to prevent fee theft

docs: Market vault for token 0 - derived from market and token_0

docs: Market vault for token 1 - derived from market and token_1

docs: Anyone can call this instruction to destroy expired tokens

docs: Pre-launch escrow account for this token

accounts.name: treasury
docs: Treasury to receive 50% of mint fee

docs: Destroyer's FeelsSOL account to receive 50% of mint fee

fields.name: amount_0_min
docs: Minimum amount of token 0 to receive

fields.name: amount_1_min
docs: Minimum amount of token 1 to receive

fields.name: close_account
docs: If true, close the position account after withdrawing liquidity
If false, keep the account open (useful if you want to collect fees later)

fields.name: tick_step_size
docs: Number of ticks between each stair step

fields.name: initial_buy_feelssol_amount
docs: Optional initial buy amount in FeelsSOL (0 = no initial buy)

fields.name: initial_buy_feelssol_amount
docs: Optional initial buy amount in FeelsSOL (0 = no initial buy)

fields.name: mint_fee
docs: Initial mint fee in FeelsSOL lamports

fields.name: default_protocol_fee_rate
docs: Default protocol fee rate (basis points, e.g. 1000 = 10%)

fields.name: default_creator_fee_rate
docs: Default creator fee rate for protocol tokens (basis points, e.g. 500 = 5%)

fields.name: max_protocol_fee_rate
docs: Maximum allowed protocol fee rate (basis points)

fields.name: mint_fee
docs: New mint fee (None to keep current)

fields.name: default_protocol_fee_rate
docs: New default protocol fee rate (None to keep current)

fields.name: default_creator_fee_rate
docs: New default creator fee rate (None to keep current)

fields.name: max_protocol_fee_rate
docs: New max protocol fee rate (None to keep current)

fields.name: position_index
docs: Position index (0-7 for up to 8 POMM positions)

types.name: feels::instructions::mint_token::MintTokenParams
docs: Parameters for minting a new token

types.name: feels::instructions::swap::SwapParams
docs: These parameters control swap behavior including slippage protection,
tick crossing limits, and fee caps for user protection.

fields.name: amount_in
docs: Amount of input token to swap (gross amount before fees)

fields.name: minimum_amount_out
docs: Minimum amount of output token to receive (after all fees)

fields.name: max_ticks_crossed
docs: Maximum number of ticks to cross during swap (0 = unlimited)
Prevents compute unit exhaustion and potential griefing

fields.name: max_total_fee_bps
docs: Maximum total fee in basis points (0 = no cap)
Provides user protection against excessive fees

fields.name: force
docs: Force transition even if criteria not met (governance only)

fields.name: fees_token_0
docs: Token balances (u128 to prevent overflow in high-volume scenarios)

fields.name: tau_spot
docs: partition counters (virtual partitions, u128 for overflow safety)

fields.name: floor_tick_spacing
docs: DEPRECATED: This field is no longer used. POMM width is now derived from market tick spacing.

fields.name: buffer_authority_bump
docs: Canonical bump for buffer authority PDA
Storing the bump prevents ambiguity and improves performance

fields.name: initial_tau_spot
docs: Initial buffer size for circuit breaker calculations

fields.name: protocol_owned_override
docs: Protocol-owned token amount override for floor calculation
If non-zero, this value is used instead of dynamically calculating
Allows governance to set a fixed protocol-owned amount

types.name: feels::state::escrow::PreLaunchEscrow
docs: Pre-launch escrow account for newly minted tokens
This temporary account holds tokens and mint fees until market goes live

fields.name: token_mint
docs: Token mint this escrow is for

fields.name: market
docs: Associated market (set when market is initialized)

fields.name: escrow_authority_bump
docs: Canonical bump for escrow authority PDA

types.name: feels::state::market::FeatureFlags
docs: Feature flags for future phases (all OFF in MVP)

fields.name: sqrt_price
docs: Spot AMM state (simplified constant product for MVP)

fields.name: global_lower_tick
docs: Floor liquidity bounds (TEMPORARY - will be removed when POMM uses pure positions)
These currently serve as bounds for pool-owned liquidity but will be
replaced with actual position NFTs in a future upgrade.
Global swap bounds - hard limits for all swaps in this market

fields.name: floor_liquidity
docs: Liquidity at the global bounds (legacy POMM field, kept for compatibility)

fields.name: fee_growth_global_0_x64
docs: Global fee growth (Q64) per liquidity unit

fields.name: fee_growth_global_0
docs: Global fee growth without x64 suffix (for compatibility)

fields.name: oracle
docs: Oracle data is stored in a separate account to reduce stack usage

fields.name: market_authority_bump
docs: Canonical bump for market authority PDA
Storing prevents recomputation and ensures consistency

fields.name: reentrancy_guard
docs: Set to true at the start of sensitive operations and false at the end
Prevents re-entrant calls during critical state transitions

fields.name: tick_snapshot_1hr
docs: Price movement tracking for circuit breaker

fields.name: initialized
docs: Whether this observation has been initialized

types.name: feels::state::oracle::OracleState
docs: Oracle state account that stores price observations

fields.name: pool_id
docs: Pool ID this oracle belongs to

fields.name: observation_index
docs: Index of the most recent observation

fields.name: observation_cardinality
docs: Current number of observations (grows from 1 to MAX)

fields.name: oracle_bump
docs: Bump seed for the oracle PDA

types.name: feels::state::pool_registry::PoolEntry
docs: Registry entry for a single pool

fields.name: nft_mint
docs: Position NFT mint (Metaplex Core asset ID)

fields.name: fee_growth_inside_0_last_x64
docs: Fee growth inside the position at last update (Q64 fixed point)

fields.name: tokens_owed_0
docs: Tokens owed to position (collected fees + removed liquidity)

fields.name: is_pomm
docs: Whether this is a POMM position

fields.name: last_updated_slot
docs: Last slot this position was updated

fields.name: fee_growth_inside_0_last
docs: Fee growth inside at last action (for proper accounting)

fields.name: authority
docs: Authority that can update protocol parameters

fields.name: mint_fee
docs: Fee for minting a new token (in FeelsSOL lamports)

fields.name: treasury
docs: Treasury account to receive protocol fees

fields.name: default_protocol_fee_rate
docs: Default protocol fee rate (basis points, e.g. 1000 = 10%)

fields.name: default_creator_fee_rate
docs: Default creator fee rate for protocol tokens (basis points, e.g. 500 = 5%)

fields.name: max_protocol_fee_rate
docs: Maximum allowed protocol fee rate (basis points)

fields.name: token_expiration_seconds
docs: Time window (in seconds) for deploying liquidity after token mint
If liquidity isn't deployed within this window, token can be destroyed

fields.name: depeg_threshold_bps
docs: De-peg circuit breaker threshold (bps of divergence)

fields.name: depeg_required_obs
docs: Required consecutive breach observations to pause

fields.name: clear_required_obs
docs: Required consecutive clear observations to resume

fields.name: dex_twap_window_secs
docs: DEX TWAP window and staleness thresholds (seconds)

fields.name: dex_twap_updater
docs: Authorized updater for DEX TWAP feed (MVP single updater)

fields.name: dex_whitelist
docs: DEX whitelist (venues/pools) - fixed size for MVP

fields.name: mint_per_slot_cap_feelssol
docs: Optional per-slot caps for mint/redeem (FeelsSOL units). 0 = unlimited.

fields.name: dex_last_update_slot
docs: Last update slot for DEX TWAP

fields.name: native_last_update_slot
docs: Last update slot for native rate

fields.name: dex_last_update_ts
docs: Last update timestamp for DEX TWAP

fields.name: native_last_update_ts
docs: Last update timestamp for native rate

types.name: feels::state::safety_controller::DegradeFlags
docs: Degraded mode flags for various safety conditions

fields.name: high_volatility
docs: High volatility detected: raise minimum fees

fields.name: redemptions_paused
docs: Whether redemptions are paused due to de-peg

fields.name: consecutive_clears
docs: Consecutive safe observations since last breach

fields.name: last_divergence_check_slot
docs: Last slot when divergence was checked (prevents double-counting)

types.name: feels::state::tick::Tick
docs: Must be exactly aligned with no padding for zero_copy

fields.name: can_create_markets
docs: Whether this token can create markets (for future use)

types.name: feels::state::token_metadata::TokenType
docs: Token type enum for tracking SPL vs Token-2022
